A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am honestly surprised this movie got made. Ruined the lore of the other seven movies. I am in the camp that they should throw this away and try again. So many awesome topics brought up in ep vii that were irresponsibly handled and squashed in this movie that there is nothing to currently look forward to in ep ix. I would honestly watch TPM before I watched this. I truly question anyone who says this is a good movie. RIan Johnson screwed this franchise and should be ashamed.
